Thanks!

hey i kinda found a solution but i dont know if it would work for others, right click on the cucusoft shortcut and click on the file location then click on the application above MP4ConverterSuite which is MP4 converter, it should work.  you can also try running Cucusoft as administrator by right clicking the cucusoft icon and selecting run as administrator

I got that error message like everyone else so what I did is run it as administrator. It gave me the option of adding another email/serial number in so I did that. 

It works when I run it as an admin now. This is honestly the best converting software for apple products and videos in general. 

Everything else is crappy compared to this.
